data.query:
SELECT TOP 1000 [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.State], [System.ChangedDate]
FROM WorkItems
WHERE [System.State] IN ('Closed', 'Completed')
AND [System.ChangedDate] >= @Today-30
ORDER BY [System.ChangedDate] DESC
